full_summary:
**Cloud-Based Enterprise Learning Management System (LMS) - Request for Information**

**Publication Number**
cb-868-42960143

**Notice Type**
Request for Information (RFI)

**Issuing Authority**
Public Safety Canada (PS)

**Contracting Authority Contact**
Matthew Furlong, matthew.furlong@ps-sp.gc.ca, (782) 640-1351

**Subject**
The Contracting Authority requests industry input and feedback to inform the development of a cloud-based Enterprise Learning Management System (LMS).

**Purpose**
This RFI aims to gather information from industry regarding the capacity to provide commercial off-the-shelf (COTS) solutions for a cloud-based LMS. The Contracting Authority seeks to understand industry's capabilities and provide an opportunity for feedback and suggestions to ensure that the system meets the requirements and objectives.

**Key Information**
- The contract term is anticipated to be three (3) years, with the possibility of two (2) additional one-year options.
- The selected solution will support the Government Operations Centre (GOC) Incident Management Tool.

**Instructions for Response**
- Interested respondents are required to submit their responses electronically to the Contracting Authority by no later than 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST) on December 4, 2024.

**Documentation**
- Documents must be submitted in either official language of Canada.
- Additional information and the respondent form can be found at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52213/request-for-information---saas-learning-management-system---respondent-form.pdf (English) or https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52213/request-for-information---saas-learning-management-system---respondent-form_fr-ca_0.pdf (French)
